alert.note: Alert for Benton; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 11 at 5:27PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN BENTON AND CENTRAL LINN COUNTIES... At 526 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fairfax, or near Cedar Rapids, moving east at 25 mph. A second severe thunderstorm was located north of Blairstown also moving east. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Cedar Rapids, Marion, Hiawatha, Robins, Belle Plaine, Fairfax, Atkins, Central City, Springville, Palo, Shellsburg, Newhall, Blairstown, Van Horne, Alburnett, Keystone, Norway, Prairieburg, Luzerne, and Toddville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
